text:
Hi everyone,
I am trying to update tickets via the API UPDATE endpoint as shown in <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/tickets?_ga=2.246197761.420130860.1633424848-40922091.1625556198>
While i do a test run on the example or via postman it runs perfectly fine but when i try the same on my server i get the following error "{"error":"A server error occurred. Check the logs for more details by running 'hs logs updateTicketStatus'"}"

When i run hs logs it shows "Promise Rejection HTTP Server Error"
Any help would be appreciated

Hey <@U01S5KAF7U4>, on the pages that you sections excluded from. You would want to add a class of `hs-search-hidden` to those areas. See here: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/features/content-search#how-to-exclude-sections-of-a-page-from-being-indexed-in-search>
Hi, in Custom Code action, I know how to get the properties using `crm.contacts.basicApi.getById`, but how do we get the Form-submissions list of the Contact?
